description: Celebrate St. Patrick’s Day this year with a delicious,&nbsp;warm cocktail that has all the right ingredients to keep your senses awake for partying and merry-making the entire day!The coffee in this drink is not bitter or overpowering but instead compliments the creaminess of Irish whiskey. This sweet yet savory beverage will leave you feeling satisfied while still being able to&nbsp;party hard later on!
